title: Can This Case Fix The iPhone's Biggest Problem?
description: Let's get 50K downloads to support RED, all you have to do is download from this link:  Comment done when you have downloaded Angry Birds 2 - Learn more at facebook.com/joinRED  Send me a screenshot on Twitter/Instagram after you've downloaded the game -  or   iXTRA iPhone Case -   This iPhone case aims to fix some of the shortcomings of the iPhone (iPhone 6/6s/7). In the case of the iPhone 7 it will even add back a traditional headphone jack.  Heres some more info from the manufacturer -  Introducing Folio Case from iXtra, a revolutionary new mobile phone case that combines the best of mobile phone chargers, memory cards and cloud storage, all in the palm of the consumers hand. Our proprietary technology also allows for access to the data from other devices directly from the case which no other case can do. iXtras memory cases meet Apples MFI certification requirements and are available in sleek leather case in four different colors.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
